title: Power Sharing in the UK and Russia

content.question: Which of the following is true of Mexico and Nigeria with regard to power sharing as a means to promote stability?

choices.label: Over the past two decades, both Mexico and Nigeria have forcibly centralized power in the national government.
Over the past two decades, both Mexico and Nigeria have formally devolved some powers to subnational units.
Over the past two decades, Mexico has consolidated power in the national government, while Nigeria has formally devolved some powers to subnational regions.
Over the past two decades, Mexico and Nigeria have both greater autonomy to regions with violent separatist movements.

content.answer: Over the past two decades, both Mexico and Nigeria have formally devolved some powers to subnational units.
